title: Best of The Herd for 06/25/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/25/2019
description:
Colin says the issues people create with the NBA are myths and the NBA awards Monday night proved it. He thinks the Lakers need to go make some role players feel special because they are not going to get any big name free agents so don't waste time trying. Plus, Rockets GM Daryl Morey explains why he likes being the bad guy if it means he's winning. Plus, he explains why he feels good that they can attract a big name free agent this offseason.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
